about_the_game:
Magusgaia, a country full of wonders, requires the assistance of Lawmages to protect it from the threat of magical creatures.

You are one of the few people invited to study at the prestigious Lawmage Academy. Upon acceptance, you are assigned by the administrators to one of the Houses.

You then proceed to the Academy, knowing little of the dark secrets that await you...



  • Discover your home among the 4 Academy Houses.
  • Learn spells by reading books and attending classes.
  • Fight strategically by exploiting weaknesses and breaking shields.
  • Gather various ingredients from breathtaking locations.
  • Craft potions and charms to aid you in missions.
  • Create meaningful bonds with your classmates and help them grow.
  • Explore the Academy and find secret rooms.
  • And many more...



Hello everyone!

This is Verinius, the creator of Lawmage Academy. I have been working alone on this project back in 2018 using RPG Maker MV. After releasing the demo in Itch, it was received positively by the community and was featured by several indie game streamers at Twitch. This is my first game and to know that people genuinely enjoyed what I have created makes me happy.

I have no background in making games so I had to learn the necessary skills by watching Youtube tutorials. Currently, I am working full time as a lawyer and work on the game in my free time. Fortunately, I was able to save up some money to commission some illustrations and music for this demo. This is a learning process for me so I am grateful for your patience and support.

I hope you enjoy the demo!

- Verinius
